content.text:
I'll analyze the codebase to understand what "Warmup" means in this context. Let me explore the project structure.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Glob">
<parameter name="pattern">**/*</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
["CLAUDE.md", "PAI-TPOS-docs/BMAD-Analysis.md", "PAI-TPOS-docs/Claude-Code-Best-Practices.md", "PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-Analysis.md", "PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-Architecture-Diagrams.md", "PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-vs-BMAD-Comparison.md", "PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-vs-ClaudeCode-Comparison.md", "PAI-TPOS-docs/Research-CIS-PublicSkills-BMADBuilder.md", "PAI-TPOS-docs/TPOS-Final-Configuration.md"]
</result>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Bash">
<parameter name="command">ls -la /Users/pretor/Documents/PAI\ -\ TPOS/</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
total 24
drwxr-xr-x@  4 pretor  staff   128 Jun  4 15:49 .
drwx------+ 27 pretor  staff   864 Jun  4 15:49 ..
-rw-r--r--@  1 pretor  staff  4815 Jun  4 15:17 CLAUDE.md
drwxr-xr-x@ 10 pretor  staff   320 May 15 11:38 PAI-TPOS-docs
</result>

I understand - this appears to be a "Warmup" request to familiarize myself with the TPOS project context. Let me provide a summary of what I've learned:

---

## TPOS Project Overview

**TPOS** (The Personal Operating System) is a personal AI-powered operating system combining:

### Architecture (Hybrid Strategy)

| Layer | Source | Function |
|-------|--------|----------|
| **Foundation** | Claude Code | Skills, Commands, MCP |
| **Runtime** | PAI (Personal AI Infrastructure) | UOCS, Voice, Hooks, Dashboard |
| **Methodology** | BMAD Method v6 | C.O.R.E., 4-Phases, Quality Gates |

### Current Status: Phase 2 (90% Complete)

- PAI installed
- Voice functioning
- Agents tested
- **Open items:** UOCS + Createskill

### Key Components

1. **PAI Runtime**: UOCS (context system), Voice Server, Hooks, Observability Dashboard
2. **BMAD Methodology**: C.O.R.E. framework, 4-phase workflow, Checklists
3. **Dual-Generator Strategy**: Createskill (individual skills) + BMAD Builder (domain ecosystems)

### Planned Phases

| Phase | Content | Status |
|-------|---------|--------|
| 1 | Core Installation (PAI) | Done |
| 2 | AI Training | 90% |
| 3 | Branding + BMAD-Core Skill | Pending |
| 4 | Business Skills | Pending |
| 5 | Obsidian System | Pending |

### Critical Files for Implementation

- `/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/CLAUDE.md` - Project instructions and context
- `/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/TPOS-Final-Configuration.md` - Final decisions, Dual-Generator
- `/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/PAI-Analysis.md` - PAI System, UOCS, Hooks, Agents
- `/Users/pretor/Documents/PAI - TPOS/PAI-TPOS-docs/BMAD-Analysis.md` - C.O.R.E., 4-Phases, Scale-Adaptive
- `~/.claude/plans/effervescent-napping-tide.md` - 5-Phase Implementation Plan (Hybrid)

---

I'm ready to assist with any specific planning or exploration tasks for the TPOS project.
